words.hint: A digital icon representing a person in virtual spaces
A multi-tool folding gadget with many blades and gadgets
A mythical container that released all the world's evils
The eerie feeling that you've lived through this exact moment before
The idea that a tiny flap of wings can cause a hurricane elsewhere
A bond between people that is emotionally harmful and unhealthy
The rising and falling of the ocean caused by the moon's pull
The deadly disease that wiped out millions in the Middle Ages
A thought experiment where an animal is both alive and dead
A mental technique for remembering things by visualizing a room
A cosmic object with gravity so strong even light can't escape
The ancient practice of trying to turn lead into gold
A fictional world where society is oppressed and everything is ruined
The hooded figure carrying a scythe who represents the end
Someone who visits the past or the future
Being isolated to prevent the spread of a contagious illness
A curved wooden tool that comes back when you throw it
A portable container for carrying water or spirits
Websites where people share photos and chase likes
A diet that avoids wheat products
Shows that follow people's supposedly real lives
Someone who gets paid to promote stuff on their phone
Sitting down to view an entire season of a show in one go
The big online shopping day after Thanksgiving
Computers capable of tasks that usually require a human brain
A tally of things you want to do before you pass away
Ending a relationship by suddenly disappearing and not replying
A small secondary job to earn extra cash
A warning that you're about to reveal the ending of a story
A game where you solve puzzles to get out of a locked area
The anxiety that others are having fun without you
Quick meals served through a window or over a counter
A pocket device used for calling, texting, and the internet
A photograph you take of your own face
An exercise focus on stretching and meditation
A person who does not consume any animal products
The most famous digital currency in the world
An audio series you listen to on your device
A custom list of songs put together for a specific mood
A very strong desire to travel and see the world
